Wedding Day

14.08.2019

Night Before Wedding Day - 13th August 2019

Details and information regarding the night before the Wedding Day.

El Vivero Beach Club & Restaurant, Sitges - 7:30pm

Meet at 'El Vivero Beach Club', located in Sitges at 7:30pm, for drinks and nibbles.

Reserved Area

An area has been reserved for our wedding guests, at the El Vivero Beach Club - guests will be provided with a wrist band on arrival.

Wedding Day - 14th August 2019

Details and info regarding the day of our Wedding.

Pic Nic Bar, Sitges - 3pm

Meet at 'Pic Nic Bar', located in Sitges at 3pm. This is situated opposite Calipolis Hotel on the beach front.

Regarding Pickup

Coach transport to the venue will pick up from Calipolis for all guests. No stop offs or alternate pick- ups will be arranged.

Wedding Dinner Choice

Guests have a choice between: -

  • Tender beef with seasonal wild mushroom sauce and potato bravas
  • Oven roast leg of duck with orange sauce, candied tangerines and spiced bread and potato bravas

Dietary Requirements

Please contact bride or groom about special dietary requirements.
